code: /**  * The leaf lookup for the Lucene segment this script was created for.  */ protected final LeafSearchLookup getLeafLookup() {     return leafLookup. }

code: /**  * Return the parameters for this script.  */ public Map<String, Object> getParams() {     return params. }

code: /**  * The doc lookup for the Lucene segment this script was created for.  */ public final Map<String, ScriptDocValues<?>> getDoc() {     return leafLookup.doc(). }
